post.title: Have you ever been in a crisis or dangerous situation around a woman?  They literally just stand there and make whimpering noises.

body:
Even in situations which aren't that big of a deal most women will crumble under the pressure. 

Like everyday stressful situations, there are lots of women who will just stand by, scream, and then need to cry about it later. Women handle stress very poorly. 

I actually don't mind this about women, in that they are soft and need comforting, I just mind that we have to pretend that it isn't the case, and that they are just as strong as men and should be allowed to be cops and soldiers and put everybody's elses lives at risk in the name of some BS like feminism.

If any man did the same he'd be despised, even though the only difference is that he has balls.
